articles.title: Minutes of vigorous activity a day might lower risk of death - Study - Prensa Latina
articles.description: Washington, Jan 4 (Prensa Latina) Short bursts of intense activity several time a day, like climbing stairs, running for the bus or carrying heavy groceries, were linked to a significantly reduced risk of dying within seven years, a study found.
